textBox.richText: A new journal article from the team on bi-modal face and speaker recognition in challenging mobile conditions has been accepted for publication to Image and Vision Computing: E. Khoury, L. El Shafey, C. McCool, M. Günther, and S. Marcel. Bi-modal biometric authentication on mobile phones in challenging conditions. Image and Vision Computing, 2013. (in press). [PDF as RR] [URL] [Source code available soon]
New journal article in Image and Vision Computing
